attributes.review: This app crashed my phone every time I tried to open it! Disgusting. The layout of the app itself is horrible, unsightly, and hard to navigate. I would never download this app again !
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: this app made me throw up when i got it. it also worked very slowly and i have a medical condition where I can only use my left middle toe to use apps and it really wasn’t set up for that which is a shame

attributes.review: This app is pretty useless and is unnecessary. It doesn’t really give you any more information about trumps campaign than the media does. The app also has trouble loading and working. Just useless.
